content.p: Welcome to the School of English! Our broad range of expertise celebrates the diversity and richness of the English language, its literatures, their performance and their histories. We are a community built on research and education, where all of our lecturers are active researchers and our students are welcomed into the research community. Trent Building The University of Nottingham University Park, Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5900 email: english-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk
